data.title: Dive into anything
data.text:
I don't know if someone thought this before but in Bran I on ADWD Coldhands give Bran&Co a "pig" to roast and eat. I think that pig was actually a man of the Night Watch (who Coldhands previusly killed).

I have somekind of evidence:

*Just before Bran talks about the pig he was warging on Summer and he taste human flesh

*In prologue of ADWD Haggon told Varamyr that eat another human was an abomination, and Bran did everything that Haggon named as an abomination (except be in Summer when his giving a shewolf love)

*In Sam II of ASOS he thinks that a man being on fire smell like a pig, so it's probable that Bran mistook the smell

*And OFC JojenPaste

If this was posted over and over before sorry :c thx for reading
